artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: two attendants resting in a low, wide boat, one is seated supporting himself with a long pole, the other is standing and smoking a pipe; another parked boat to the R; several other boats are approaching the opposite shore of the sandbar with travelers disembarking
markings: seals URQ and center R edge
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
signed: signed center R edge; title URQ
title: Mitsuke: Tenryū River View
